metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9706 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Vixie Cron before the 3.0pl1-133 Debian package allows local users to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and daemon crash) because of a force_rescan_user error.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9706` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cron - 3.0pl1-134ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cron package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0pl1-134ubuntu1').
